text: Yabonani xa iiVesi zeThu zicengcelezwa kubo abo bangenathemba lakudibana naThi (ngeNye iMini), bathi: “Sizele ne’Kur’ân engasiyiyo le, kungenjalo tshintsha le.” Yithi wena (Muhammad), “Ayikokwam ukuyitshintsha ngokwendlela endithanda ngayo, kuphela mna ndilandela oko kutyhiliweyo kum. Inene mna ndoyika isohlwayo seMini eNkulu xa ndinokungayithobeli iNkosi yam.”
